meanings.sent1: Their sisterhood was evident in how they always supported each other.
meanings.sent2: The bond of sisterhood between them grew stronger with each passing year.
meanings.sent3: In their sisterhood, they shared secrets and giggles like best friends.
meanings.sent4: The sisterhood they shared was like a sturdy bridge connecting their hearts.
meanings.sent5: The warmth of their sisterhood enveloped them like a cozy blanket on a chilly night.

meanings.definition: An association, society, or community of women linked by a common interest, religion, or trade.
meanings.sent1: The sisterhood of female artists collaborated on a beautiful mural in the city.
meanings.sent2: She found solace and support in the sisterhood of fellow writers at the workshop.
meanings.sent3: The sisterhood of bakers exchanged recipes and baking tips every Saturday.
meanings.sent4: The powerful sisterhood of activists marched together for equality and justice.
meanings.sent5: Being part of the sisterhood of nurses meant always having a strong support system.
